name: Valentyn Murashko
what_you_do: Valentyn is a cold-calling professional. He led a team of 25 SDRs at Selling.com. Today, Valentyn helps companies build an effective cold-calling channel by training their SDRs on how to cold-call effectively.
who_you_serve: Valentyn has trained over 60 specialists in various industries including SaaS, outstaffing, and IT.
business_focus: Helping companies build an effective cold-calling channel by training their SDRs.
